title: Huge TV deal: this Vizio OLED TV gets a massive $500 discount at Best Buy

summary: Get this 65-inch OLED TV on sale for $1,499.99

As we mentioned above, this is not only a fantastic discount but the best price we've found for the OLED TV. We don't know how long Best Buy will have this Vizio set at the price, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.
